element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm simplifies points, removing nodes from them. This reduces the amount of data needed to store a polygon, while preserving its original shape as much as possible. The number of nodes removed depends on a tolerance value.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The input layer with polygons to simplify

element.name: TOLERANCE
element.text: The tolerance to use. Larger values will yield more simplified polygons (a larger number of points will be removed)

element.name: PRESERVE
element.text: If selected, the algorithm will preserve the topology.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output layer with simplified polygons. The attributes table is left unaltered.
